text: @senrobportman @realDonaldTrump Seriously? Not a single person with medical expertise leading the Coronavirus Task Force. Instead we get YesMan Pence and financial ppl in Kudlow and Mnuchin - it's obvious that he only cares about the market and re-election. You can fk all the way off.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
